General.Name: Nigbas Nigde Beton Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Nigbas Nigde Beton Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. engages in production and sale of prefabricated concrete products and reinforced concrete structures in Turkey. The company provides prefabricated building systems, including general service buildings, industrial and agricultural facilities, education and sports facilities, and precast infrastructure elements; and concrete electrification poles, such as main, lighting, electricity transmission line, and railway catenary poles. It also offers construction materials, which include cement-based building chemicals and ready-mixed concrete; and landscaping elements, such as concrete kerb units, concrete paving stones, concrete fence poles, and concrete flower beds. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Nigde, Turkey.
General.Address: Fertek Mah. Organized Industry, Nigde, Turkey
